General.Name: Binasat Communications Bhd
General.Description: Binasat Communications Berhad, an investment holding company, provides support services for satellite, mobile, and fibre optic telecommunication networks in Malaysia. The company offers very small aperture terminal (VSAT) engineering/operation and maintenance services, such as high-speed broadband satellite communications for Internet or private network communications, as well as VSAT hub/teleport services; and telecommunication managed services operation and maintenance services, civil mechanical and engineering services, telecommunication equipment installation services, and microwave installation services. It also provides fiber network engineering services; digital satellite services on a closed-circuit basis; and consulting and IT services. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
